features: ✅ Preserve your butter- This premium butter dish is tightly sealed, effectively keeping out unwanted insects and extra oxygen. The glass butter dish with lid maintains your butter’s flavor and freshness.
✅ Exquisite and classic- Add beauty to your table with this pretty butter dish! The rich glass tray, topped with the unique handle knob on its lid, will dazzle your guests.

✅ Especially convenient- With its handy knob, the butter holder’s lid lets you access your butter easily. The tray’s two sides were specifically crafted for a comfortable grip when you wish to move it.
✅ Perfectly safe- The pure crystal glass that comprises the butter dish is utterly harmless to your food. Unlike the plastic versions, it is BPA free, lead free and odor free- your butter stays pure!

✅ Versatile dish- This adaptable butter keeper works for all types of butter sticks. Adorn your kitchen with it by placing it wherever you wish- on the countertop, on your table, or in the refrigerator.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PRESERVE YOUR BUTTER This premium butter dish is tightly sealed, effectively keeping out unwanted insects and extra oxygen. This glass butter dish with lid maintains your butters flavors and freshness! EXQUISITE AND ATTRACTIVE Add beauty to your table with this pretty dish! The rich engraved design on the sparkly tray, topped with the unique butterfly handle on its cover, will dazzle your guests! ESPECIALLY CONVENIENT With its handy knob, the butter holder lid lets you access your butter easily. The trays two sides were specifically crafted for comfortable grip when you wish to move it!

SERVE BUTTER WITH STYLE AND ELEGANCE! Featuring unique crystal-etched designs that will surely match to any decor. Place as your table centerpiece and let your guests serve themselves with elegance. PERFECTLY SAFE The pure crystal glass that comprises the butter dish is utterly harmless to your food. Unlike the plastic versions, it is BPA free, lead free, and odor free. Your butter stays pure! VERSATILE DISH This adaptable butter keeper works for all types of butter sticks. Adorn your kitchen with this butter dish by placing it wherever you wish – on your countertop, table, or in the refrigerator!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy and Beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how beautiful this butter dish is. It is extremely heavy weight and it is so pure, it looks like expensive crystal. I was thrilled to see it labeled "Lead Free". The knob on top makes it easier to lift the lid off the butter, but because of the weight, lift carefully so it doesn't slip out of your hands. What a lovely surprise this is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the butter clean and ready to sue
reviews.reviewText: This works great for keeping the butter clean. The knob on top is a little small for older hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This went into service about 10 minutes after I got it. Real nice & heavy. However, one caveat: I wouldn't try to lift the cover with the glass "handle" - I tried it & almost dropped the top. As far as I'm concerned, it is for decoration only. If you use it to lift the cover, be ready to clean up broken glass...Otherwise, nice butter dish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great classic looking butter dish. Well worth the price paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and functional
reviews.reviewText: I leave my butter out most of the time and this butter dish is perfect for keeping it safe and sound!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too small for normal "West Coast" butter cube
reviews.reviewText: This butter dish to attractive, the lid knob it great, and it is long enough for a normal butter cube, but its not high or wide enough for typical "West Coast" sticks that are shorter/fatter. So the butter sticks to lid when try to lift it, and the sides get all smudged so looks messy all the time. Would work fine If was 1/2 inch taller/wider, would be great dish. Otherwise, only recommend if you use the "East Coast" style sticks that are long and skinny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad price
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good butter dish. Well made. Bought 2 of these.
Nice but small . Arrived on time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality but far too small
reviews.reviewText: We’ll made but only suitable for the smaller pre-cut slices. Too small to take a standard butter pack.
It will fit 1/4 of a pubs of butter. Cut it length-wise in 4 to fit a piece. I like like how it looks and it’s very sturdy. I expected it to be larger but am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Point faible de ce type de beurrier
reviews.reviewText: Ce beurrier bien que bien solide et facile à manipuler a pourtant un défaut c'est que le couvercle se ferme sur le plateau du beurre donc plus sujet à se salir que si le couvercle se serait fermé à l'extérieur de la base

reviews.reviewTitle: Narrow lid & butter gets stuck on sides
reviews.reviewText: It’s a beautiful simple lead free butter dish. We like the quality but the lid is a bit narrow & butter gets stuck on the sides easily. You will definitely need to cut the butter up before placing it onto the dish if you usually purchase a 1 pound block of butter. It may be a hassle to some.
